an6.46:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma mahacundo cetisu viharati sayamjatiyam.
an6.46:1.3: Tatra kho ayasma mahacundo bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.46:1.5: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahacundassa paccassosum.
an6.46:2.2: ‘ime pana jhayinomha, jhayinomhati jhayanti pajjhayanti nijjhayanti avajjhayanti.
an6.46:2.3: Kimime jhayanti, kintime jhayanti, katham ime jhayanti’ti?
an6.46:2.4: Tattha dhammayoga ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, jhayi ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, na ca bahujanahitaya patipanna honti bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an6.46:3.1: Idha panavuso, jhayi bhikkhu dhammayoge bhikkhu apasadenti:
an6.46:3.2: ‘ime pana dhammayogamha, dhammayogamhati uddhata unnala capala mukhara vikinnavaca mutthassati asampajana asamahita vibbhantacitta pakatindriya.
an6.46:3.3: Kimime dhammayoga, kintime dhammayoga, katham ime dhammayoga’ti?
an6.46:3.4: Tattha jhayi ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, dhammayoga ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, na ca bahujanahitaya patipanna honti bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an6.46:4.1: Idha panavuso, dhammayoga bhikkhu dhammayogananneva bhikkhunam vannam bhasanti, no jhayinam bhikkhunam vannam bhasanti.
an6.46:4.2: Tattha dhammayoga ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, jhayi ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, na ca bahujanahitaya patipanna honti bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an6.46:5.1: Idha panavuso, jhayi bhikkhu jhayinanneva bhikkhunam vannam bhasanti, no dhammayoganam bhikkhunam vannam bhasanti.
an6.46:5.2: Tattha jhayi ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, dhammayoga ca bhikkhu nappasidanti, na ca bahujanahitaya patipanna honti bahujanasukhaya bahuno janassa atthaya hitaya sukhaya devamanussanam.
an6.46:6.5: Acchariya hete, avuso, puggala dullabha lokasmim, ye amatam dhatum kayena phusitva viharanti.
an6.46:7.5: Acchariya hete, avuso, puggala dullabha lokasmim ye gambhiram atthapadam pannaya ativijjha passanti”ti.
